text: (Kananjalo abo bayalinda) de kudambe uvalo ezintliziyweni zabo. Baya kuthi (omnye komnye): “Itheni na: iNkosi yenu?” (baphendule) bona bathi: ‘Yinyaniso.’ Yaye Yona nguSobunganga Omkhulu.’” Yithi: “Ngubani onondlayo emazulwini nasemhlabeni? Yithi: “nguAllâh.” Inene sithi okanye nini abaphantsi kwesiKhokelo okanye ekulahlekeni okucacileyo!”
